column15: AVA - Idols  Best Price Rs 3591.00 Best Discount 10% Off EMI Rs 599 for 6 months FREE Shipping in 2 Days
column17:
Add beauty to your home by decorating it with this beautifully carved Lord Ganesha idol from AVA. This excellent art piece is painted with all the beautiful and exquisite colours and the great detailing makes it worth spending for. The main attraction of the showpiece is that it features a waterfall coming out of the trunk of Lord Ganesha.

Features
  • Brand: Ava
  • Category: Home Decor
  • Type: Waterfall Showpiece
  • Colour: Multicolour
  • Usage: Decorative


Care Tip
Clean with a damp cloth.
